page.title: 05TRANSPORT MAULDEN BY_PASS.
page.content: The Ampthill to Maulden by_pass was finished in{1984}.It was made because too many lorries,cars and buses went through Ampthill town centre.The by_pass branches off from Clophill road.The traffic comes to the by_pass from Maulden,Clophill and of course from Ampthill.On the side of the by_pass there are ditches running along the edge of the road.These are here because the road had to be raised up,also these can be used for draining water from the road.The by_pass has successfully kept the rate of traffic down,but we still get a lot of traffic coming in to Ampthill from Bedford. There is one roundabout where it is quite common for lorries to roll over. So we advise{caution}when appoaching this junction.
